doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 4 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 1/16/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 4 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 1/16/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Joyce Hunter, Darrell Yates Rist, and Evan Wolfson2. Short news bits3. Discussion of ex-gay man with AIDS who wants to be married in a Catholic church and discrimination against gay people and persons with AIDSCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine4. Discussion of the "Baby M" surrogate case and its possible impact on the gay community5. UCLA poll finds 52% of national graduating college students support laws prohibiting homosexual behaviorCOMMERCIAL: GCN's "Year in Review" VHS tape6. Andy Humm on the rates of unprotected sex among teenagers7. News Briefs, three of anti-gay Patt Robinson's tax-exempt groups audited by IRS8. London, Anglican churchmen advised to work out individual issues with homosexuality before attending at the bedside of a gay person dying of AIDS9. Philadelphia, Colin Cook resigns from Quest ex-gay Learning center for engaging in sexual activities with students10. East Lansing, Michigan, agrees to strengthen anti-discrimination protection for gays and other minorities11. Oregon, gay inmates in prison allowed to kiss and hold hands during visits12. Sports Report13. Feature story on Gay Cable Network by Japanese program "New Yorking," with behind-the-scenes footage of GCN14. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History, with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine2. Moments of Meditation, satirical segment with Ernest T. LeeCOMMERCIAL: The Monster3. Media Watch with Brandon Judell, announcement of "La Cage aux Folles" closing in London4. Interview with members of GLAAD, writers Marcia Pally and James Saslow, discussion of the media's coverage of homosexualityCOMMERCIAL: Zamir's Furs5. Show Bits with George Trahanis, review of off-Broadway play, "Jerker"COMMERCIAL: A Different Light bookstore6. Olivia Negron interviews Robert Drucker, banker at the Actor's Federal Credit Union7. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 4 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 1/16/1987]: January 1987
